tit.j: 滋賀県立琵琶湖文化館
tit.e: Shiga Prefectural Museum, Biwako Bunkakan (Biwa-ko Lake Cultural Center)
Shiga Prefectural Museum, Biwako Bunkakan (Biwa-ko Lake Cultural Center)
Shiga Prefectural Museum, Biwako Bunkakan (Biwa-ko Lake Cultural Center)

sen.j: 滋賀県立琵琶湖文化館（しがけんりつ びわこぶんかかん）は、滋賀県大津市にある博物館。
sen.e: Biwako Bunkakan is located in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
Biwako Bunkakan is located in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.
Biwako Bunkakan is located in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 現在休館中。
sen.e: It is currently closed.
It is currently closed.
It is currently closed.

sen.j: 琵琶湖文化館は1948年に開館した滋賀県立産業文化館を前身とする。
sen.e: The forerunner of Biwako Bunkakan was Shiga Prefecture Industrial and Cultural Center, which opened in1948.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処「滋賀県立産業文化館」定訳不明
sen.e: The forerunner of Biwako Bunkakan was Shiga Prefecture Industrial and Cultural Center, which opened in1948.
The forerunner of Biwako Bunkakan was Shiga Prefecture Industrial and Cultural Center, which opened in1948.

sen.j: 博物館、近代美術館、展望閣、淡水魚水族館などを有する滋賀県初の総合博物館として1961年に開館した。
sen.e: Biwako Bunkakan opened in 1961 as Shiga Prefecture's first museum complex, including a general history museum, a modern art museum, an observation tower, and a freshwater aquarium.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処art museum との区別を明確にするため博物館=general history museumとしました。
sen.e: Biwako Bunkakan opened in 1961 as Shiga Prefecture's first integrated museum, including a general history museum, a modern art museum, an observation tower, and a freshwater aquarium.
Biwako Bunkakan opened in 1961 as Shiga Prefecture's first integrated museum, including a general history museum, a modern art museum, an observation tower, and a freshwater aquarium.

sen.j: その後、近現代の日本画・洋画のコレクションは滋賀県立近代美術館に移された。
sen.e: Subsequently the collection of modern and contemporary Japanese style paintings and oil paintings was moved to The Museum of Modern Art, Shiga.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処滋賀県立近代美術館 = The Museum of Modern Art, Shiga
sen.e: Subsequently the collection of modern and contemporary Japanese style paintings and oil paintings was moved to The Museum of Modern Art, Shiga.
Subsequently the collection of modern and contemporary Japanese style paintings and oil paintings was moved to The Museum of Modern Art, Shiga.

sen.j: 考古資料は滋賀県立安土城考古博物館に、淡水水族館は滋賀県立琵琶湖博物館に移された。
sen.e: Archaeological documents were moved to Shiga Prefectural Azuchi Castle Archaeological Museum and the freshwater aquarium was moved to Lake Biwa Museum.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処滋賀県立安土城考古博物館 = Shiga Prefectural Azuchi Castle Archaeological Museum 滋賀県立琵琶湖博物館 = Lake Biwa Museum
sen.e: Archaeological documents were moved to Shiga Prefectural Azuchi Castle Archaeological Museum and the freshwater aquarium was moved to Lake Biwa Museum.
Archaeological documents were moved to Shiga Prefectural Azuchi Castle Archaeological Museum and the freshwater aquarium was moved to Lake Biwa Museum.

sen.j: 現在は「近江の歴史と文化」にテーマを絞って郷土の文化を紹介する施設になっている。
sen.e: Now Biwako Bunkakan concentrates on the theme of the history and culture of Omi (an old administrative area which corresponds to present-day Shiga Prefecture) introducing its local culture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Now Biwako Bunkakan concentrates on the theme of the history and culture of Omi (an old administrative area which corresponds to present-day Shiga Prefecture) introducing its local culture.
Now Biwako Bunkakan concentrates on the theme of the history and culture of Omi (an old administrative area which corresponds to present-day Shiga Prefecture) introducing its local culture.

sen.j: その核となるのは常設の企画展示室で、国宝2件・国の重要文化財53件を含む質の高い仏教美術作品を展示する。
sen.e: Its main exhibit is a permanent collection of high quality Buddhist art works including 2 "naional treasures" and 53 "national important cultural properties".
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Its main exhibit is a permanent collection of high quality Buddhist art works including two naional treasures and fifty three national important cultural properties.
Its main exhibit is a permanent collection of high quality Buddhist art works including two naional treasures and fifty three national important cultural properties.

sen.j: それらの作品は滋賀県内の寺院から寄託されたものである。
sen.e: These were entrusted to Biwako Bunkakan by temples in Shiga Prefecture.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: These were entrusted to Biwako Bunkakan by temples in Shiga Prefecture.
These were entrusted to Biwako Bunkakan by temples in Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 2008年3月31日をもって休館することが、県議会における県教育長の答弁により表明された（2007年12月）。
sen.e: In December 2007 the head of the Board of Education announced in the prefectural assembly that Biwako Bunkakan would close on March 31, 2008
In December 2007 the head of the Board of Education announced in the prefectural assembly that Biwako Bunkakan would close on March 31, 2008.
In December 2007 the head of the Board of Education announced in the prefectural assembly that Biwako Bunkakan would close on March 31, 2008.

sen.j: 2008年3月31日（実際には月曜が休館日となるため3月30日を以って休館）を以って休館しており、現在一般人が館内に立ち入ることは出来ない。
sen.e: Biwako Bunkakan has been closed since March 31, 2008 (in fact since March 30 because it was normally closed on Mondays) and it is not possible for the public to enter.
Biwako Bunkakan has been closed since March 31, 2008 (in fact since March 30 because it was normally closed on Mondays) and it is not possible for the public to enter.
Biwako Bunkakan has been closed since March 31, 2008 (in fact since March 30 because it was normally closed on Mondays) and it is not possible for the public to enter.

sen.j: また、今後公開が再開されるかどうかも未定である。
sen.e: It hasn't been decided yet whether it will reopen to the public or not.
It hasn't been decided yet whether it will reopen to the public or not.
It hasn't been decided yet whether it will reopen to the public or not.

sen.j: 施設の老朽化やバリアフリー化への未対応の問題もあり、今後同施設での公開は難しいと思われる。
sen.e: Because the facilities are outdated and not yet barrier free it seems difficult for it to reopen in this building.
Because the facilities are outdated and not yet barrier free it seems difficult for it to reopen in this building.
Because the facilities are outdated and not yet barrier free it seems difficult for it to reopen in this building.

tit.j: 2階- 企画展示室、仏教美術の展示
tit.e: Second floor: exhibition room, display of Buddhist art works
Second floor: exhibition room, display of Buddhist art works
Second floor: exhibition room, display of Buddhist art works

tit.j: 3階- テーマ展示室、近世、近代絵画の展示
tit.e: Third floor: exhibition room, display of recent, modern paintings
Third floor: theme exhibition room, display of recent, modern paintings
Third floor: theme exhibition room, display of recent, modern paintings

tit.j: 4階- パネル展示室、「びわ湖と近江の文化」をテーマとする展示
tit.e: Fourth floor: panel exhibition room, display based on the theme of "Biwa-ko Lake and Omi culture"
Fourth floor: panel exhibition room, display based on the theme of "Biwa-ko Lake and Omi culture"
Fourth floor: panel exhibition room, display based on the theme of "Biwa-ko Lake and Omi culture"

tit.j: 5階- 展望閣、眼前に琵琶湖が広がる
tit.e: Fifth floor: observation tower, Biwa-ko Lake view
Fifth floor: observation tower, Biwa-ko Lake view
Fifth floor: observation tower, Biwa-ko Lake view

tit.j: 休館日- 月曜日（祝日の場合は翌日）
tit.e: Closed: Mondays (Tuesday if the Monday is a holiday)
Closed: Mondays (Tuesday if the Monday is a holiday)
Closed: Mondays (Tuesday if the Monday is a holiday)

tit.j: 構造- 地上3層・5階、地下1階建
tit.e: Structure: Five stories above ground and one basement
Structure: Three-tier and five stories above ground and one basement
Structure: three tiers and five stories above ground and one basement

tit.j: 所在地- 〒520-0806 滋賀県大津市打出浜地先
tit.e: Address: Uchidehama Chisaki, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture 520-0806
Address: Uchidehama Chisaki, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture 520-0806
Address: Uchidehama Chisaki, Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture 520-0806

sen.j: 京阪電気鉄道京阪石山坂本線 島ノ関駅 徒歩約5分
sen.e: Approximately 5 minutes walk from Shimanoseki Station, Keihan Ishiyama-sakamoto line, Keihan ElectricRailway
Approximately 5 minutes walk from Shimanoseki Station, Keihan Ishiyama-sakamoto line, Keihan ElectricRailway
Approximately 5 minutes walk from Shimanoseki Station, Keihan Ishiyama-sakamoto line, Keihan ElectricRailway

Approximately 15 minutes walk from Otsu Station on JR Biwako line
Approximately 15 minutes walk from Otsu Station on JR Biwako line
